extendedInfo.description: On New Year's Eve 2012, a serie of drawings by Nostradamus was very evident. Although puzzling, many experts put them as clear evidences that the end of times was near. This application brings 13 nonsense drawings by XTO that could have many interpretations, but they were forced to signify the end of the world. Explanatory texts appear with the drawings when requested.

reviews.title: Muito bom!

reviews.title: Useless and a wast of time
reviews.comment: The drawings and captions dont match and who knows they probably found random pics and made up their own explanation
